apps.title: WriteFreely
apps.description: Minimalist blog software providing focused writing and publishing experience. Easy on resources.

apps.title: Mobilizon
apps.description: A network to gather, organize, and mobilize.

apps.title: Plume
apps.description: Blogging application suitable for collaborative writing.
apps.techStack: Rocket, Diesel, Ructe templates, WASM, SCSS

apps.title: Lemmy
apps.description: Link aggregator, a federated alternative to Reddit / Lobste.rs / Raddle / Hacker News.

apps.title: microblog.pub
apps.description: Self-hosted, single-user, ActivityPub powered microblog.

apps.title: Epicyon
apps.description: ActivityPub server implementing S2S and C2S protocols, suitable for single board computers. Provides moderation tools, post expiry, content warnings, and image descriptions.

apps.title: Lotide
apps.description: A federated forum / link aggregator.

apps.title: Socialhome
apps.description: Personal webpage with social networking functionality. Column grid layout makes it a perfect network for sharing image content or creating personal portfolio.

apps.title: Bookwyrm
apps.description: Social reading and reviewing, a federated alternative to GoodReads.

apps.title: Zap
apps.description: Facebook-like Fediverse server with more privacy and less drama.

apps.title: Gancio
apps.description: A shared agenda for local communities. Decentralized events.

apps.title: dolphin
apps.description: Lightweight ActivityPub Server optimized for single-user. A fork and sister project of Misskey.

apps.title: Honk
apps.description: ActivityPub server with minimal setup and support costs.

apps.title: Reel2Bits
apps.description: Self-hosted soundtracks and podcasts sharing.

apps.title: go-littr
apps.description: Link aggregator inspired by Reddit.

apps.title: Kroeg
apps.description: Generic ActivityPub server, with a focus on microblogging style activities.

apps.title: Smithereen
apps.description: Federated, ActivityPub-compatible social network with friends, walls, and groups.

apps.title: Glitch-soc
apps.description: A friendly fork of Mastodon, with the aim of providing additional features at the risk of potentially less stable software.

apps.title: Hometown
apps.description: A fork of Mastodon that provides local posting and a wider range of content types.

apps.title: Ktistec
apps.description: An ActivityPub server with minimal dependencies, optimized for single-user application.

apps.title: OLKi
apps.description: A self-hosted linguistic corpora exchange platform that aims to be a simple gateway to the Fediverse for scientific interaction.

apps.title: pubgate
apps.description: Lightweight ActivityPub CMS. Implements both client-to-server (C2S) and server-to-server(S2S) APIs. Compatible with Mastodon, Pixelfed, Pleroma and microblog.pub.

apps.title: Mistpark
apps.description: Fediverse server with nomadic identity, groups, events, conversational views.

apps.title: Osada
apps.description: Fediverse server.

apps.title: Redmatrix
apps.description: Zot6 server.

apps.title: Roadhouse
apps.description: Next gen Fediverse server.

apps.title: castling.club
apps.description: Challenge someone to a game of chess using toots! An ActivityPub server with a single hardcoded King service actor that acts as a chess arbiter.

apps.title: Guppe
apps.description: Social groups for Mastodon and other ActivityPub networks.

apps.title: Socialtap
apps.description: Drink socially. A federated version of Untappd.com. It extends the ActivityPub types.

apps.title: Nextcloud-Social
apps.description: Social networking app for NextCloud users.

apps.title: Read.as
apps.description: Long-form reader. It helps you gather and curate things to read in a peaceful space.

apps.title: dokieli
apps.description: In-browser article authoring and formatting, RDFa annotations, and social interactions tool.

apps.title: FediBlog
apps.description: Fully customisable blog engine for web devs and others.

apps.title: Rustodon
apps.description: Mastodon-compatible social microblogging server.

apps.title: groundpolis
apps.description: A microblogging service forked from Misskey.

apps.title: Kanzaki
apps.description: A Mastodon-compatible, ActivityPub-speaking server in OCaml.

apps.title: Anfora
apps.description: Self-hosted photo gallery social network.

apps.title: Gath
apps.description: Self-destructing, shareable, no-registration event pages.

apps.title: The Occasion Octopus
apps.description: A federated network of Open Data for discovering interesting events.

apps.title: Aardwolf
apps.description: Facebook-like social network connecting communities across the web.

apps.title: MoonTree
apps.description: Link aggregator like Reddit / Hackernews, but open source and self-hosted.

apps.title: Pubcast
apps.description: Experimental ActivityPub based podcasting platform.

apps.title: Smilodon
apps.description: A complementary fork of Mastodon, focusing on opt-in public spaces.

apps.title: microstatus
apps.description: Lightweight Mastodon and GNU social-compatible server implementation.

apps.title: Tavern
apps.description: A minimalistic Activity Pub server. Think Mastodon, but smaller and with fewer features.

apps.title: SkoHub
apps.description: SkoHub creates a publication / subscription infrastructure for Open Educational Resources. It allows to follow specific subjects and to be notified when new content about that subject is published.

apps.title: CPub
apps.description: General ActivityPub server built upon Semantic Web ideas. Implements a Linked Data Platform (LDP), uses RDF Turtle as serialization format.

apps.title: SemApps
apps.description: A collaborative, generic knowledge management system. Aims to ease data storage and filtering.

apps.title: Vervis
apps.description: A project hosting and management application. Implementation of ForgeFed.

apps.title: LubarGW2
apps.description: Federating guild website using GuildWars2 API.

apps.title: Learn Awesome
apps.description: Open-source equivalent review aggregation site. Think GoodReads, but generalized to all learning resources organized by topics, formats and difficulty. Optimal learning paths for any topic.
apps.techStack: Rails, PostgreSQL, Bootstrap, Stream Dashboard UI Kit

apps.title: Bonfire
apps.description: Your plug & play federated social network. Based on CommonsPub, runs on RaspberryPi devices. Still in beta.

apps.title: Immers Space
apps.description: A decentralized virtual reality metaverse platform powered by Mozilla Hubs and ActivityPub-Express.

apps.title: Readlebee
apps.description: An attempt to create a viable Goodreads alternative. Book reading progress, lists, reviews, comments, and more.

apps.title: distbin
apps.description: Post bin with distributed social features.

apps.title: Lumen-AP-server
apps.description: ActivityPub server using Lumen framework.

apps.title: Spritely
apps.description: A distributed social network by ActivityPub specification co-author Christopher Lemmer Webber.

apps.title: Kepi
apps.description: A Django-based microblogging server, written in Python, which supports the Mastodon protocol.

apps.title: MrBotchi
apps.description: A federated microblogging platform for single-user.

apps.title: Technopolis
apps.description: A globally interconnected micro-blogging platform inspired by Misskey.

apps.title: Jejune
apps.description: A work-in-progress ActivityPub server designed to use constructions which provide functional security and resilience.

apps.title: Fedeproxy
apps.description: An online service to federate forges.

apps.title: Flocking Bird
apps.description: Network for professionals. A LinkedIn alternative.

apps.title: Tranquility
apps.description: Small ActivityPub server written in Rust.

apps.title: hacker-don
apps.description: ActivityPub server and web frontend written in Clojure, prioritizing user sanity, safety and privacy.

apps.title: Mastotool
apps.description: A collection of tools to work with your Mastodon account; displays account statistics and lets you search your toots.

apps.description: A headless Mastodon-compatible Fediverse server project, written in Golang.

apps.title: CastoPod Host
apps.description: An open-source hosting platform made for podcasters who want to engage and interact with their audience.

apps.title: Corteza

apps.description: A libre, self-hostable, federated, imageboard platform that utilizes ActivityPub.

apps.title: Catcast D
apps.description: A federated video live streaming platform.

apps.title: Lectrn
apps.description: A social network for humans that is free, decentralized, open, and easy to use.

apps.title: FitTrackee
apps.description: A simple self-hosted workout / activity tracker.

apps.title: diaspora*
apps.description: Online world where you are in control. Has 'aspects' similar to Google+ 'circles', and all the basic features of a macroblogging network.

apps.title: Friendica
apps.description: Personal network that helps to keep in contact with friends. Interface and functionality include common features of a mainstream social network.

apps.title: Funkwhale
apps.description: Community-driven audio server and player that lets you listen and share music within a decentralized, open network. A place for socializing around music and discovering new content.

apps.description: Microblogging server with multiple plugins.

apps.title: Hubzilla
apps.description: Multi-purpose network for power users. Includes a significant number of features and granular settings.

apps.title: Misskey
apps.description: Sophisticated microblogging with personality. Provides many additional features like calendar, emoji reactions, polls, games, and many other widgets.

apps.title: PeerTube
apps.description: Decentralized video platform, a network of interconnected video hosting providers. Video broadcasting may be peer-to-peer.

apps.title: Pixelfed
apps.description: An image sharing platform with modern user interface.

apps.title: Pleroma
apps.description: Microblogging platform with excellent performance and low resource consumption. Has many features: polls, custom themes, markdown support.

apps.title: Mastodon
apps.description: Epic microblogging network with many features and multiple interface layouts to choose from.

apps.title: Redaktor
apps.description: An ActivityPub powered CMS in the making.

apps.title: Prismo
apps.description: Federated link aggregation service, without downvotes.
